com.example.diningapp

Class HallActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.example.diningapp.HallActivity

  • public class HallActivity
extends Activity
    Creates a Hall, an All You Care To Eat eatery from data in the MasterEateryList This class populates static items (logo, description, containers) in the same thread, but uses AsyncTasks to get and set items that need to be grabbed online (menus and schedules)
    Author:
    James Stoyell

        public void openMaps(View v)

        Parameters:

      • toggle_contents

        public void toggle_contents(View v)
        An onClick listener that either expands or hides a menu when a header is tapped
        Parameters:
        v - The View that was clicked on, to be used to determine what menu to show

      • getAndSetMenu

        private void getAndSetMenu(java.lang.String meal,
                 TextView menu)
        Uses an AsyncTask to get menu information and put it into the appropriate menu TextViews
        Parameters:
        meal - The meal to get menu information for
        menu - The menu to put that information into
